Use class c-menu in order to create an overlay menu.

To assign a trigger for the menu, add the attribute data-handler-for-menu to any anchor or button. 


        <button data-handler-for-menu="my_menu">Open menu</button>
        <ul class="c-menu" id="my_menu">
            <li class="c-menu__item"><a href="">Item</a></li>
            <li class="c-menu__item"><a href="">Item</a></li>
            ...
        </ul>
